verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump ’s school safety commission] [V: convened] [ARG1: its first public hearing] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , and members got an earful from witnesses worried about its direction .
President Trump ’s school safety commission convened its first public hearing on Wednesday , and [ARG0: members] [V: got] [ARG1: an earful] [ARG2: from witnesses worried about its direction] .
